author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Returning from the horrors of its predecessor, Ashes of Man by Christopher Ruocchio features a changed, traumatized protagonist—one who bears the weight of great expectations from man but silence from the beings who selected him as special. We’re thrown back into the hollow glory of war, the harrowing of battles, and the emptiness of space, […]

The post REVIEW: Ashes of Man by Christopher Ruocchio appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Ashes of Man by Christopher Ruocchio
